title: 867-530Zeit 4/10: RIP XFL, Apple and Google, Rudy Gobert, Save the Post Office
itunes:title: 867-530Zeit 4/10: RIP XFL, Apple and Google, Rudy Gobert, Save the Post Office
description:
On this edition of 867-530Zeit Jack and Miles discuss the XFL suspending operations entirely, Apple and Google are working on a surveillance tool together, Rudy Gobert's antics are not sitting well with his teammates, and #SavethePostOffice is trending because they received no part of the $2T Stimulus Package and are especially hurting during this time.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
